tool_description: API for NFT-commerce. Mint and trade NFTs on 250+ blockchains with simple REST API
name: Thentic
title: Thentic

api_list.name: New Wallet
api_list.description: Create new wallet for every EVM Blockchain.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thentic.p.rapidapi.com/wallets/new"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thentic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Transfer NFT
api_list.description: Transfer NFTs using existing NFT contract - must be NFT owner to transfer.
